items.question: What level of detail can I expect in the models?
items.answer: The AI produces high-detail models with accurate proportions and customizable features, ready for rendering or integration into various applications.

items.question: Can I influence the design style of the models?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can specify styles or themes as well as features through your specifications and concept art, allowing for personalized design.

items.question: What file formats are available for the downloaded models?
items.answer: Generated models can be downloaded in several file formats including OBJ, STL, and FBX, compatible with most 3D software.

items.question: How fast is the model generation process?
items.answer: Model generation typically takes just a few minutes depending on the complexity of the design. The AI streamlines the workflow significantly.

items.question: Are there any usage rights for the generated models?
items.answer: Yes, you own full commercial rights to the models created through WaveSpeed, allowing for use in marketing, sales, and product development.

items.question: What supports are available for using the AI generator?
items.answer: We offer extensive documentation, tutorial videos, and live support options to assist you in maximizing your use of the AI car model generator.

items.question: How do I get started with the car model generator?
items.answer: Simply sign up and use your free credits to start creating car models. The interface is user-friendly to facilitate quick learning.

items.question: Can the generator handle requests for complex designs?
items.answer: Yes, the generator is capable of handling complex specifications, though simpler designs will yield faster results. We recommend starting with clearer guidelines.

items.question: Is there a limit to how many models I can create?
items.answer: There are no strict limits on the number of models you can create, making it easy to explore multiple designs and ideas.
